  • Constructor Details

    • movie

      public movie(int movieId, String title, String synopsis, boolean blockBuster, String typeOfMovie, int status, String ViewerAdvisory, String director, ArrayList<String> cast, double d, ArrayList<Review> pastReview)
      Constructor for movie class
      Parameters:
      movieId - unique ID number for movie
      title - movie title
      synopsis - movie synopsis
      blockBuster - indicates if a movie is blockbuster or not
      typeOfMovie - movie genre
      status - indicates movie status, if it is advance sales, now showing, or coming soon
      ViewerAdvisory - viewer advisory rating for movie (G, PG, PG13, NC16, etc)
      director - lists movie director
      cast - cast list
      d - overall rating score by viewers
      pastReview - all reviews for this movie
